item.description: OK, so we were going to see the Guilford fireworks but there was very little interest. Instead we will meet at the New Haven Green for a picnic and to listen to the New Haven Symphony. Here's a link http://www.newhavensy... Bring a small dish to share or just a bag of chips, and if you want wine or booze, bring your own. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a small bunch of Purple and Yellow Balloons tied to a lawn chair

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Plan B - New Haven Symphony, wine and cheese.
